org.sat4j.specs
インタフェース RandomAccessModel

既知のサブインタフェースの一覧:
ICDCL<D>, IGroupSolver, IOptimizationProblem, IProblem, ISolver
既知の実装クラスの一覧:
AbstractClauseSelectorSolver, AbstractMinimalModel, AbstractOutputSolver, AbstractSelectorVariablesDecorator, ClausalCardinalitiesDecorator, DimacsOutputSolver, DimacsStringSolver, FullClauseSelectorSolver, GateTranslator, GroupClauseSelectorSolver, HighLevelXplain, LexicoDecorator, ManyCore, MaxSatDecorator, Minimal4CardinalityModel, Minimal4InclusionModel, MinOneDecorator, ModelIterator, ModelIteratorToSATAdapter, NegationDecorator, OptToSatAdapter, SingleSolutionDetector, SolutionCounter, Solver, SolverDecorator, StatisticsSolver, Xplain
public interface RandomAccessModel

That interface allows to efficiently retrieve the truth value of a given variable in the solver.

作成者:
daniel

メソッドの概要
 boolean model(int var)
          Provide the truth value of a specific variable in the model.
 

メソッドの詳細

model

boolean model(int var)
Provide the truth value of a specific variable in the model. That method should be called AFTER isSatisfiable() if the formula is satisfiable. Else an exception UnsupportedOperationException is launched.

パラメータ:
var - the variable id in Dimacs format
戻り値:
the truth value of that variable in the model
導入されたバージョン:
1.6
関連項目:
#model()
